rows.label: tlk45320159_04_msg0001
rows.name:
I think the most important military
innovation Superbia has produced
to date is the steam rifle.

rows.label: tlk45320159_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Apparently they were inspired by,
and to an extent based upon, certain
long-range weapons used by Blades.

rows.label: tlk45320159_04_msg0003
rows.name:
But whatever their origins, they allow
almost anyone to hold their own in
combat, even if they're not a Driver.

rows.label: tlk45320159_04_msg0004
rows.name:
The ability to attack from a distance is
hugely helpful, too. It helps us avoid the
risks of getting too close to monsters.
